channel.title: How to make an npc follow you

item.title: How to make an npc follow you
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

[quote=“codyskate5021, post:2, topic:424138”][quote author=rhys132 link=topic=526795.msg3838263#msg3838263 date=1323035695]
if you could please help me make an npc follow you :D, this is the peice of code

[code]if(playerCommand.startsWith(“banker”)) {
Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, 1157, c.absX, c.absY, 0, 0, 120, 7, 70, 70, false, false);

		}[/code]

thats what i have but it doesnt follow you, so i just made a command ::banker that opens bank for now?

if anyone know how to make an npc follow you please post

this spawns a packyak but i need to make it follow the player
[/quote]
dude this gave me an idea if you get 99 summ ima make a custom pouch spawn a banker the goes where u go :0 a personal banker[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an npc follow you
